The Facebook post was published on Febru: 2020, and contained misleading information about a novel coronavirus patient being identified in Bihar's Purnea district.
Dr: Vinod Kumar, the doctor named in the misleading Facebook post, issued a denial letter stating that the claim was baseless and false. He confirmed the authenticity of the letter during a phone conversation with AFP on February 13, 2020.
The Chief Medical Officers of Purnea and: Dr. Madhusudhan Prasad and Dr. R.C. Mandal, also confirmed in separate phone conversations with AFP on February 13, 2020, that there were no confirmed coronavirus cases in their respective districts.
